story_parts.text:
The space cowboy rode into town on his trusty steed, a cosmic stallion with a heart of gold. He had come to this backwater world to make his fortune, and he was going to start by robbing the local bank. He had a plan all worked out, and he was confident that nothing could go wrong.

The space cowboy walked into the bank and announced his intentions. The tellers and customers all froze, and the security guard reached for his gun. But

next_options.0: The space cowboy gets shot by the security guard and dies
next_options.1: The space cowboy robs the bank and gets away with the money
